entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Winnipeg (The Forks)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:15 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Winnipeg - The Forks 12:00 AM CST Saturday 11 March 2023
Temperature: -4.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 58 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -11.7°C
Wind: E 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h early this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and blowing snow beginning in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Blowing snow early in the evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northeast 20 overnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023
